Package org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering

A package for all classes relating to rendering.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChunkRendererDispatcher
    A Chunk Renderer dispatcher.
    MultithreadedRendererDispatcher
    An abstract class for creating a Dispatcher that performs ray-casting rendering, but distributes the work load onto multiple threads for improving performance and efficiency of the program.
    RenderChunk
    Renders a chunk (multiple lines at once).
    Renderer
    An interface for rendering engines.
    RendererFactory
    A Factory that creates renderer objects.
    RenderStrip
    A class for rendering individual vertical scans of the screen.
    SingleThreadedRenderer
    Display Object for rendering graphics on screen.
    StripRendererDispatcher
    A class for dispatching the threads to work on RenderStrip class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RendererType
    Enum used to create a new renderer from a saved file.

Package org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering Description

A package for all classes relating to rendering.
Since:
2019-01-12, v0.5
